definition: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)
pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Liang2 nong2 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: FAO estimated 37 percent of children suffered from stunting.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國糧農組織估計有37%的兒童遭受發育障礙。

sentences.english: FAO will therefore establish local disease control centres in hot-spot areas.
sentences.chinese: 糧農組織將爲此在熱點地區建立當地的疾病控制中心。

sentences.english: People hit a panic button in spite of FAO's reassurance.
sentences.chinese: 糧農組織一再聲明，但恐慌仍在蔓延。

sentences.english: That's 12 percent less than the U.N. Food and Agriculture Administration estimate.
sentences.chinese: 而美國糧農組織則表示這12%的分佈率小於英國。

sentences.english: FAO as an institution should be held responsible.
sentences.chinese: 糧農組織作爲一個機構應當負有責任。

sentences.english: The mandate of FAO is to address food security and poverty alleviation.
sentences.chinese: 糧農組織的使命是處理糧食安全和減少貧困。

sentences.english: The FAO says each person ate an average of almost 17 kilograms of fish last year.
sentences.chinese: 糧農組織說去年人均喫魚量幾乎是17公斤。

sentences.english: He's just been elected the new Director-General of the UN's Food and Agriculture Organisation, the FAO.
sentences.chinese: 他剛剛被選爲新的聯合國糧農組織的新處長。

sentences.english: He is expected to assume his duties at FAO in January 2008.
sentences.chinese: 預計他將於2008年1月到糧農組織赴任。

sentences.english: Livestock breeding is crucial in this respect, FAO believes.
sentences.chinese: 糧農組織相信，在這方面家畜育種至關重要。

sentences.english: In this chapter, the United Nations Food and Agriculture Organizations(FAOs) experience with decentralization is briefly reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 簡要回顧了聯合國糧農組織的分權管理經驗。

sentences.english: In cases where projects are subcontracted to national institutions, FAO offers technical supervision.
sentences.chinese: 如果項目分包給國家機構，糧農組織則進行技術監督。

sentences.english: FAO is also a source of knowledge and information.
sentences.chinese: 糧農組織也是知識和信息的來源。

sentences.english: What is FAO's approach towards rehabilitating tsunami-affected areas?
sentences.chinese: 糧農組織對受海嘯影響地區的恢復採取何種方法？

sentences.english: An enhanced network for collaboration for FAO’s future support to member countries.
sentences.chinese: 強爲糧農組織今後支持成員國進行合作的網絡。

sentences.english: FAO also aims to strengthen veterinary services through training and the provision of equipment.
sentences.chinese: 糧農組織還努力通過培訓和提供設備來加強獸醫服務。
